title: New: Oh Wonder – Technicolour Beat
content:
With 5 million plays on their Soundcloud, plays on Radio 1 and a growing Spotify presence, UK duo Oh Wonder (Jose Vanders aka LAYLA and Ant West) have been one of the most talked about new artists of the past year, and have started 2015 exactly how they ended 2014.

With an album pencilled in for later this year, they’re continuing their tradition of releasing one song a month, with March’s contribution being Technicolour Beat, a slow burning number, settling somewhere between Hundred Waters and Sylvan Esso, with the sort of intricate production that made SOHN’s debut LP such an immersive listen.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
